item.title: 黄金避险需求如何推动价格创下历史新高
item.description: 数个世纪以来，黄金始终是政治经济动荡时期最可靠的避险资产。作为一种价值稳定、便于携带且全球通用的商品，当万物动荡时，它总能带来安全感。【原文：For centuries, gold has been the go-to haven asset in times of political and economic uncertainty. Its status as a reliably high-value commodity that can be transported easily and sold anywhere offers a sense of safety when everything else is in turmoil.】

item.title: 体育联盟努力吸引球迷远离非法直播
item.description: 随着越来越多的游戏、赛事和比赛被置于订阅付费墙后，粉丝们开始寻找替代方案。【原文：Fans look for workarounds as more games, matches and races go behind subscription paywalls.】

item.title: 特朗普将韩国纳入加征关税名单，最新威胁空洞无力
item.description: 彭博经济分析显示，特朗普仅在约四分之一的情况下兑现关税威胁。【原文：A Bloomberg Economics analysis shows Trump follows through on tariff threats only about a quarter of the time】

item.title: 特朗普在关税问题上约73%的时间选择退缩
item.description: 彭博经济研究的最新报告量化了美国总统兑现贸易威胁的频率。【原文：New research from Bloomberg Economics quantifies how often the US president follows through on his trade threats.】

item.title: 零售财富成为2400亿美元二级市场繁荣的黄金矿脉
item.description: 据杰富瑞金融集团报告显示，个人私募投资基金已成为规模达2400亿美元的二手私募股权市场中增长最快的资本来源。【原文：Private investment funds for individuals have become the fastest-growing source of capital in the $240 billion market for private secondhand stakes, according to a report from Jefferies Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 英伟达缺乏明确继任者接替缔造公司的明星CEO
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋——硅谷任职时间最长的CEO——近日被问及如何在该职位上坚守三十余年。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s Jensen Huang, the longest-serving chief executive officer in Silicon Valley, was recently asked how he’s managed to stay in the job more than three decades.】

item.title: 特斯拉目标股价持续攀升，盈利前景却急转直下
item.description: 华尔街对特斯拉公司释放出矛盾信号。分析师们对这家电动汽车制造商今年的盈利潜力日益持怀疑态度，但他们对该公司股价的预期却持续攀升。【原文：Wall Street is giving off mixed signals about Tesla Inc. Analysts are increasingly skeptical of the electric-vehicle maker’s earnings potential this year, but their expectations for the company’s stock price keep climbing.】

item.title: 比特币信徒正将目光投向股票和黄金
item.description:
随着黄金和股票的上涨，最初的加密货币较10月峰值下跌了约25%。

【原文：

The original cryptocurrency is down about 25% from its October peak as gold, stocks rally.

】

item.title: 高盛称全球经济增长推动市场风险偏好升至2021年以来最高水平
item.description: 高盛集团策略师指出，随着经济乐观情绪抵消地缘政治不确定性，投资者风险偏好已升至五年高位。【原文：Investor appetite for risk is the highest in five years as optimism about the economy counters geopolitical uncertainty, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 莫迪1000亿美元石油钻探计划旨在削减印度进口
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪周二表示，印度将石油钻探范围扩展至此前受限区域的举措，有望在本十年结束前吸引价值1000亿美元的投资。【原文：India’s efforts to expand oil drilling to previously restricted areas could help attract investments worth $100 billion by the end of the decade, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said Tuesday.】

item.title: 国防产业将成为汽车业主导的捷克经济的支柱产业
item.description: 捷克共和国新政府将致力于将国防工业转型为国家出口经济的引擎，一位高级内阁成员表示，因为旗舰汽车行业正面临日益激烈的竞争。【原文：The Czech Republic’s new government will seek to transform the defense industry into an engine of the nation’s export economy as the flagship auto sector faces stiffening competition, a senior cabinet member said.】

item.title: 巴蒂斯塔的金融科技公司筹备巴西五年来的首次IPO
item.description: 巴西企业PicPay在过去五年间从简单的数字钱包转型为多元化金融科技公司，如今其战略转型即将面临投资者的公投。【原文：PicPay, the Brazilian firm that transformed itself from a simple digital wallet into a diversified fintech over the past five years, is about to face an investor referendum on that strategy shift.】

item.title: TikTok网红卡比·拉梅以9.75亿美元签约，实现全球粉丝群体变现
item.description: 全球最大TikTok博主卡比·拉梅与瑞奇闪耀控股有限公司达成合作，将他3.6亿社交媒体粉丝转化为商业项目。【原文：Khaby Lame, the world’s biggest TikToker, partnered with Rich Sparkle Holdings Ltd. to transform his 360 million social-media followers into a commercial venture.】

item.title: 欧洲央行必须对利率保持所有选项开放，科赫表示
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员马丁·科赫表示，鉴于全球背景的不稳定性，特别是贸易领域的不确定性，欧洲央行需要保持所有政策选项的灵活性。【原文：The European Central Bank needs to keep all options available due to the unstable global backdrop, particularly on trade, according to Governing Council member Martin Kocher.】

item.title: 股票轮动终于止步，华尔街追逐新领头羊
item.description: 去年大部分时间里，投资者都收到警告称，将资金藏身于科技巨头正变得危险。结果证明，这并非明智之举。【原文：For most of last year, investors were warned that hiding out in Big Tech was becoming a dangerous move. Turned out that wasn’t great advice.】

item.title: 利比里亚矿业与石油协议吸引48亿美元投资
item.description: 利比里亚领导人预计，与跨国公司达成的采矿和石油协议将为这个西非国家带来48亿美元的投资。【原文：Liberia’s leader expects mining and oil deals with multinational companies to generate $4.8 billion in investment in the West African nation.】

item.title: 土耳其计划收紧破产规则，此前破产申请数量激增
item.description: 土耳其计划收紧破产保护申请准入条件，此前破产申请数量激增。当局试图遏制他们所称的对关键债务重组工具的滥用。【原文：Turkey is planning to tighten access to bankruptcy protections after a surge in applications, as authorities seek to curb what they say is misuse of a key debt-restructuring tool.】

item.title: 债券市场逆势投资者瞄准美国30年期国债，收益率逼近5%
item.description: 在规模达30万亿美元的美国国债市场中，随着长期债券收益率逼近近二十年来罕见的低位，部分投资者正看到萌芽中的买入机会。【原文：In the $30 trillion US Treasury market, some investors see a budding buying opportunity with longer-maturity yields approaching levels rarely seen in the past two decades.】

item.title: TACO追踪：特朗普关税威胁仅四分之一得以实施
item.description: 不到三周时间里，唐纳德·特朗普总统已四次发出全面加征关税的威胁。在正常时期，此类威胁足以令投资者惶惶不安，让企业高管心神不宁，并迫使经济学家们紧急修订对相关国家的经济增长预测。【原文：In less than three weeks, President Donald Trump has issued four sweeping tariff threats that, in normal times, would rattle investors, unnerve CEOs and send economists rushing to revise their growth forecasts for the targeted countries.】

item.title: 中国转向采购更便宜的巴西大豆，此前已满足美国承诺
item.description: 作为全球最大的大豆进口国，中国在履行与美国达成的贸易休战协议、完成首批美国大豆采购后，已大幅增加对巴西大豆的采购订单。【原文：China, the world’s largest soybean importer, has ramped up orders for Brazilian cargoes of the oilseed after meeting an initial shipment volume from the US as part of a trade truce with Washington.】

item.title: 智利央行料将维持利率不变，因经济增长前景转好
item.description: 智利央行料将维持基准利率不变，维持在2022年初以来的最低水平，因经济增长前景改善，进一步宽松的必要性有所减弱。【原文：Chile’s central bank will likely keep its benchmark interest rate unchanged at the lowest level since early 2022 as economic growth prospects improve, tempering the need for further easing.】

item.title: 克洛斯兄弟银行出售2.5亿英镑二级资本债券，因市场前景改善
item.description: 克洛斯兄弟集团将于周二发行2.5亿英镑（3.42亿美元）的二级资本票据，因英国汽车金融投诉处理可能延迟，该贷款机构的前景获得支撑。【原文：Close Brothers Group Plc is selling £250 million ($342 million) of Tier 2 notes on Tuesday as possible delays to the UK motor finance complaints support the lender’s outlook.】

item.title: 欧盟要求谷歌安卓系统向竞争对手的人工智能系统开放
item.description: 欧盟在最新一轮针对科技巨头的监管行动中，要求谷歌在六个月内消除安卓系统中对竞争对手人工智能搜索助手的技术壁垒，并向其他搜索引擎提供商开放关键数据。【原文：Google was handed a six-month European Union deadline to lift technical barriers to rival AI search assistants on Android and give key data to other search engine providers in the latest round of its Big Tech crackdown.】

item.title: 中国消费者比特朗普发动贸易战前更节俭
item.description: 根据央行的一项调查，与中美最新一轮贸易战爆发前相比，更多中国家庭希望增加储蓄、减少支出。【原文：More Chinese households want to increase saving and reduce spending than before the latest trade war with the US, according to a survey by the central bank.】

item.title: 西班牙失业率自2008年以来首次降至10%以下
item.description: 西班牙失业率在2025年底跌破10%，创下近18年来最低水平。【原文：Spain’s unemployment rate dipped below 10% at the end of 2025, the lowest level in almost 18 years.】

item.title: 马来西亚将研究美方贸易协议 但警告勿退出协定
item.description: 马来西亚政府计划对与美国签署的争议性贸易协定进行成本效益分析，同时警告议员们应维持该协定，尽管存在可能损害国家利益的担忧。【原文：Malaysia’s government plans to do a cost-benefit analysis of its controversial trade agreement with the US, while warning lawmakers they should keep the accord despite concerns it may hurt the country.】

item.title: 嘉能可位居欧洲并购目标榜首，并购活动持续升温
item.description: 随着今年并购活动开局强劲，嘉能可公司被并购专家列为2026年欧洲潜在收购目标榜首。【原文：Glencore Plc tops the list of European companies identified by M&A experts as potential takeover targets for 2026 as dealmaking activity roars out of the gate this year.】

item.title: 百年灵首席执行官期待特朗普为瑞士制表商削减关税
item.description: 百年灵集团首席执行官预计美国将削减瑞士手表关税，这凸显了他对这家私募股权支持的企业最大市场的乐观态度，尽管华盛顿方面仍让整个行业处于猜测之中。【原文：Breitling AG’s chief executive officer expects the US to cut tariffs on Swiss watches, underscoring his bullishness on the private equity-backed firm’s biggest market even as Washington keeps the industry guessing.】

item.title: 美元交易员正以创纪录的成本押注美元将进一步下跌
item.description: 美元交易员正以创纪录的高价押注美元将进一步走弱，因动荡的美国政治局势引发了对空头对冲的抢购潮。【原文：Dollar traders are paying the most on record to bet on a deeper selloff in the greenback as a volatile US political landscape triggers a rush into bearish hedges.】

item.title: 三菱日联金融集团考虑推出与25亿美元贷款挂钩的保险公司友好型SRT
item.description: 据知情人士透露，三菱UFJ金融集团正考虑推出一项旨在吸引保险公司的重大风险转移计划。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. is considering issuing a significant risk transfer that’s designed to appeal to insurance companies, according to people familiar with the matter.】
